contents.text: Thank you for calling Tesla South Bay, your destination for electric vehicles and sustainable energy solutions.
For new electric vehicle sales and to schedule a test drive, press 1.
For information on our Tesla models and current pricing, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a vehicle information specialist.

navigationGoals: I want to schedule a test drive for a Tesla and get current pricing information.
I’d like to schedule a test drive for a Model 3 and learn about any veteran discounts.
I’d like detailed pricing and performance specs for the Dual Motor Model Y and to schedule a test drive.
I want to learn about Tesla models and schedule a test drive.
I’d like to learn about the battery capacity and efficiency of the Model 3 and schedule a test drive this Friday afternoon.

contents.text: For vehicle service, maintenance, or repair appointments, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our service department.

navigationGoals: I need to book a service appointment for my Tesla for maintenance.
I need to book a maintenance appointment for my Model Y and ask about a courtesy loaner car.
I need to book a service appointment for my Model 3 to perform a firmware update and brake pad inspection.
I need to book a maintenance appointment for my Tesla vehicle.
I need to book a service appointment for my Model X to diagnose an intermittent suspension noise.

contents.text: For solar products, installations, and energy services, press 2.
For residential solar panel installations and system design, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our solar sales team.

navigationGoals: I’d like to arrange a residential solar panel installation and discuss system design.
I want a quote for residential solar panel installation and information on veteran pricing.
I want a custom system design and quote for a 7 kW residential solar array with integrated Powerwall.
I'm interested in installing solar panels at home and need system design information.
I’m interested in designing a 5 kW residential solar panel system and want an installation estimate based on south-facing roof orientation.

contents.text: For solar panel repairs, monitoring, or technical support, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our solar service team.

navigationGoals: I need to schedule a repair appointment and technical support for my existing solar panels.
I’m experiencing issues with my home solar system monitoring and need technical support.
I need diagnostic support for my solar inverter’s grid communication error and to arrange a service visit.
I'm having issues with my solar panels and need repair support.
My home solar inverter is displaying error code F001; I need technical support to troubleshoot and repair the system.
